list.abs: 本节主要讲解矩形选框工具 (Marquee Tool)。 矩形选框工具作为最基本的图片选择工具，用户可以采用各种样式选择图片。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: from marquise, taken as plural and assimilated to -ee

encyclopedia.content: 简介 名词 n. 【英】[mɑ:'ki:] 大天幕 【美】[mɑr'ki] 锛埲肟诖Φ娘級华盖；遮篷功能 创建一个滚动的文本字幕。 function Marquee(){ if(tab2.offsetTop-tab.scrollTop<=0)//当滚动至demo1与demo2交界时 tab.scrollTop-=tab1.offsetHeight; //demo跳到最顶端 else{ tab.scrollTop++; } 参数 direction 表示滚动的方向，值可以是left，right，up，down，默认为left behavior 表示滚动的方式，值可以是scroll（连续滚动）slide

entry.tran: 大帐篷(户外活动时用作餐饮场所)
entry.def: A marquee is a large tent which is used at a fair, garden party, or other outdoor event, usually for eating and drinking in.

entry.tran: (饭店、剧院等入口处的)遮篷,遮檐
entry.def: A marquee is a cover over the entrance of a building, for example a hotel or a theatre.

means.word_mean: 2. permanent canopy over an entrance of a hotel etc.

sentences.en: Even bigger illuminated signs and animated marquees line the Las Vegas Strip of casino resorts just outside city limits.
